document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: FW: Epstein CVRA Case 
Date: Tue, 08 Jul 2008 20:28:55 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Attachments: Villafana Declaration _ re_ victim notification.wpd; DEI 080707 Petition.pdf 
Can you scan the letters and send them to me by e-mail? Thanks. 
From 
Sent: Tuesday, July 08, 2008 4:02 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: FW: Epstein CVRA Case 
Good Afternoon. 
MI and I are taking a look at the petition and affidavit that you sent and were wondering if it would be possible 
for you to send us a  copy of the letters that were sent to the victims in this case. The AUSA refers to attached 
copies in her affidavit at #3. 
We are working on this and will respond to you ASAP. 
Thanks. 
Attorney Advisor 
LECC/Vietim Witness Staff 
EOUSA 
From: 
Sent: Tuesda , Jul 08 2008 1:37 PM 
To: 
Subj : ein Case 
Ms. 
EFTA00014088

Attached please find the emergency petition filed yesterday afternoon, and a draft declaration from the AUSA. 
Our response is due on Wednesday, July 9, 2008, at close of business. 
Thanks for your assistance. 
«Villafana Declaration re victim notification.wpd» «DE1_080707_Petition.pdf» 
EFTA00014089
